Description: This registry defines the messages for telemetry related events.

TriggerDiscreteConditionMet.Description: Indicates that a discrete trigger condition is met.
TriggerDiscreteConditionMet.Message: Metric '%1' has the value '%2', which meets the discrete condition of trigger '%3'
TriggerDiscreteConditionMet.Resolution: Check the condition of the metric that reported the trigger.

TriggerNumericAboveLowerCritical.Description: Indicates that a numeric metric reading is no longer below the lower critical trigger threshold, but is still outside of normal operating range.
TriggerNumericAboveLowerCritical.Message: Metric '%1' value of %2 is now above the %3 lower critical threshold of trigger '%4' but remains outside of normal range
TriggerNumericAboveLowerCritical.Resolution: Check the condition of the metric that reported the trigger.

TriggerNumericAboveUpperCritical.Description: Indicates that a numeric metric reading is above the upper critical trigger threshold.
TriggerNumericAboveUpperCritical.Message: Metric '%1' value of %2 is above the %3 upper critical threshold of trigger '%4'
TriggerNumericAboveUpperCritical.Resolution: Check the condition of the metric that reported the trigger.

TriggerNumericAboveUpperWarning.Description: Indicates that a numeric metric reading is above the upper warning trigger threshold.
TriggerNumericAboveUpperWarning.Message: Metric '%1' value of %2 is above the %3 upper warning threshold of trigger '%4'
TriggerNumericAboveUpperWarning.Resolution: Check the condition of the metric that reported the trigger.

TriggerNumericBelowLowerCritical.Description: Indicates that a numeric metric reading is below the lower critical trigger threshold.
TriggerNumericBelowLowerCritical.Message: Metric '%1' value of %2 is below the %3 lower critical threshold of trigger '%4'
TriggerNumericBelowLowerCritical.Resolution: Check the condition of the metric that reported the trigger.

TriggerNumericBelowLowerWarning.Description: Indicates that a numeric metric reading is below the lower warning trigger threshold.
TriggerNumericBelowLowerWarning.Message: Metric '%1' value of %2 is below the %3 lower warning threshold of trigger '%4'
TriggerNumericBelowLowerWarning.Resolution: Check the condition of the metric that reported the trigger.

TriggerNumericBelowUpperCritical.Description: Indicates that a numeric metric reading is no longer above the upper critical trigger threshold, but is still outside of normal operating range.
TriggerNumericBelowUpperCritical.Message: Metric '%1' value of %2 is now below the %3 upper critical threshold of trigger '%4' but remains outside of normal range
TriggerNumericBelowUpperCritical.Resolution: Check the condition of the metric that reported the trigger.

TriggerNumericReadingNormal.Description: Indicates that a numeric metric reading is now within normal operating range.
TriggerNumericReadingNormal.Message: Metric '%1' value of %2 is within normal operating range of trigger '%3'

Name: Telemetry Message Registry
